channel.title: Help With INTS :P
channel.description:
Okay, I'm adding d claws into my server, and just want to know how to make them donator only, and admin+
here's the ints [code]if(i == 12345) // Your desired item id (the one you use after ::pickup ##### #) { class8.aStringArray189 = new String[5]; class8.aStringArray189[1] = "Wield"; // String name, this can be changed to wield, or attach, or whatever you want class8.anInt174 = 12346; // Drop/Inv Model class8.anInt165 = 12347; // Male Wield Model class8.anInt200 = 12347; // Female Wield class8.anInt188 = -1; // Male arms/sleeves (Leave as -1 if not used) class8.anInt164 = -1; // Female arms/sleeves (Leave as -1 if not used) class8.anInt181 = 650; // Zoom - Increase to make inv model smaller class8.anInt190 = 498; // Rotate up/down - Increase to rotate upwards class8.anInt198 = 1300; // Rotate right/left - Increase to rotate right class8.anInt169 = -1; // Position in inv, increase to move right class8.anInt194 = -1; // Position in inv, increase to move up class8.aString170 = "Dragon Clawz"; // Item Name class8.aByteArray178 = "A pair of Super Strong Claws".getBytes(); // Item Examine } [/code]

item.title: Help With INTS :P
item.dc:creator: @ar-temi-s ar-temi-s
item.description:
@ar-temi-s wrote:

[quote=“Wafflz, post:1, topic:283208”]Okay, I’m adding d claws into my server, and just want to know how to make them donator only, and admin+

here’s the ints

if(i == 12345) // Your desired item id (the one you use after ::pickup ##### #) { class8.aStringArray189 = new String[5]; class8.aStringArray189[1] = "Wield"; // String name, this can be changed to wield, or attach, or whatever you want class8.anInt174 = 12346; // Drop/Inv Model class8.anInt165 = 12347; // Male Wield Model class8.anInt200 = 12347; // Female Wield class8.anInt188 = -1; // Male arms/sleeves (Leave as -1 if not used) class8.anInt164 = -1; // Female arms/sleeves (Leave as -1 if not used) class8.anInt181 = 650; // Zoom - Increase to make inv model smaller class8.anInt190 = 498; // Rotate up/down - Increase to rotate upwards class8.anInt198 = 1300; // Rotate right/left - Increase to rotate right class8.anInt169 = -1; // Position in inv, increase to move right class8.anInt194 = -1; // Position in inv, increase to move up class8.aString170 = "Dragon Clawz"; // Item Name class8.aByteArray178 = "A pair of Super Strong Claws".getBytes(); // Item Examine } [/quote]

That mate, would be server side. what base do you have?

Read full topic

item.title: Help With INTS :P
item.dc:creator: @Wafflz Wafflz
item.description:
@Wafflz wrote:

Okay, I’m adding d claws into my server, and just want to know how to make them donator only, and admin+

here’s the ints

if(i == 12345) // Your desired item id (the one you use after ::pickup ##### #) { class8.aStringArray189 = new String[5]; class8.aStringArray189[1] = "Wield"; // String name, this can be changed to wield, or attach, or whatever you want class8.anInt174 = 12346; // Drop/Inv Model class8.anInt165 = 12347; // Male Wield Model class8.anInt200 = 12347; // Female Wield class8.anInt188 = -1; // Male arms/sleeves (Leave as -1 if not used) class8.anInt164 = -1; // Female arms/sleeves (Leave as -1 if not used) class8.anInt181 = 650; // Zoom - Increase to make inv model smaller class8.anInt190 = 498; // Rotate up/down - Increase to rotate upwards class8.anInt198 = 1300; // Rotate right/left - Increase to rotate right class8.anInt169 = -1; // Position in inv, increase to move right class8.anInt194 = -1; // Position in inv, increase to move up class8.aString170 = "Dragon Clawz"; // Item Name class8.aByteArray178 = "A pair of Super Strong Claws".getBytes(); // Item Examine }
